pages.name: Entry Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/rider_core_ids#gesshi_rider_core_id)Kamen Rider Gessy Core ID$(/l)

pages.title: GM Rider
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_gm_chirami)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Weakness

pages.name: Monster Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#monster_raise_buckle)Monster Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: GM Rider
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_gm_chirami)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Weakness$(br2)Monster Buckle Effects:$(li)Punch V$(li)Strength VIII (with empty hand)$(li)Resistance II

pages.name: Armed Hammer
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#hammer_raise_buckle)Hammer Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: GM Rider
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_gm_chirami)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Weakness$(br2)Hammer Buckle Effects:$(li)Strength II

pages.name: Armed Propeller
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#propeller_raise_buckle)Propeller Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: GM Rider
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_gm_chirami)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Weakness$(br2)Propeller Buckle Effects:$(li)Slow Falling VII$(li)Jump Boost VII

pages.name: Jyamato Rider
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#jyamato_buckle)Jyamato Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: GM Rider
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_gm_chirami)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Weakness$(br2)Jyamato Buckle Effects:$(li)Resistance II$(li)Strength IV

pages.name: MagnumJyamato Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#magnum_raise_buckle)Magnum Buckle$(/l) in your main hand and the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#jyamato_buckle)Jyamato Buckle$(/l) in your off-hand

pages.title: GM Rider
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_gm_chirami)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Weakness$(br2)Magnum Buckle Effects:$(li)Flame Shot$(li)Strength$(br2)Jyamato Buckle Effects:$(li)Resistance II$(li)Strength IV
